name: Shape Shooter (Zyckro)
description:
What is Shape Shooter?

Shape Shooter is a wave-based, survival shooter, where you blast shapes to pieces! How long can you survive?

Controls

Keyboard and mouse only.

W A S D -> Move Up, Left, Down, and Right, respectively.

Mouse1 -> Shoot (External Mouse recommended)

More Info

Shape Shooter is my first game I have made, so any feedback is very much appreciated! Currently, the game is only available on Windows and there are no plans to port to other platforms.
